mapper.insert: insert into device (id, serial, `name`, `system`, brand, model, version, `size`, sources, `owner`, `user`, agent, timeout, create_time, update_time, `status`) values ( #{id}, #{serial}, #{name}, #{system}, #{brand}, #{model}, #{version}, #{size}, #{sources}, #{owner}, #{user}, #{agent}, #{timeout}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status})
mapper.update:
update device set
name = #{name},
version = #{version},
agent = #{agent},
timeout = #{timeout},
`user` = #{user}, sources=#{sources}, `owner`=#{owner}, update_time=#{updateTime}, status=#{status} where serial=#{serial}
update device set sources='{}', update_time=REPLACE(unix_timestamp(current_timestamp(3)),'.',''), status='offline', `user`='', timeout=0 where agent=#{agent}
mapper.select: select * from device where (`owner` = #{owner} or `owner` = 'system') and `system` = #{system} and `status` = 'online'

select distinct(${field}) from device where (`owner` = #{owner} or `owner` = 'system')
and `system` = #{system}
